## Source: ossf-package-analysis (273b321944297087263b5b5821cab2c1f54c8c91e75998fe8c8bca26b8ffb0b7)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'business-kpi-manager' @ 5.9.1 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
